outline:
1. to sell
    1. (Qal)
      1. to sell
      2. seller (participle)
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be sold
      2. to sell oneself
      3. to be given over to death
    3. (Hithpael) to sell oneself
strongs_def: to sell, literally (as merchandise, a daughter in marriage, into slavery), or figuratively (to surrender)
